Posts.Content: hi my name is carol i first got diagnosed with breast cancer in july 2004.ihad a lumpectomy of the l breast and raditation on a tumor on my spine. the cancer spread to the bones and lungs... i did chemotherapy taxol/navalbine/ for 3 months.. and then went on zometa and herceptin .. i found out last week that i had a reacurring tumor in lymphnodes again previously i had 12 nodes removed and this time they took 2 more out and it is malignant.. the docs took me off zometa and herceptin and im waiting on decision of what to do...I am scared to my wits about this..but im willing to go thru it again..docs say no removal of tumor and that i should start raditation of the tumor...it was also mentioned that i could take lapilabib a new drug in europe..if FDA approves it for me ..if not i will go on xyloda...my wish is that we fight and find a cure... i still have enough fight in me to do another round..my love and prayers are with all of you...
Posts.Title: Stage 4 Mestastic
